name: The Wizard's Apprentice (Darzington)
description:
You're a wizard's apprentice, on a quest to earn the right to the majestic title of WIZARD. To help people on your journey, you'll have to cast elemental spells with hand gestures (in VR), later combining elements for epic two-handed spells! Will you be able to help everyone, defeat your master, and become a fully-fledged WIZARD? 🧙‍♂️

See a full playthtough here if you're stuck or don't have a VR headset.

NOTE: The Wizard's Apprentice was developed in 72 hours for the VR Super Jam using an Oculus Rift headset. No guarantees that it works with other VR headsets, sorry! The theme was OPPOSITES, this is seen in the game by the fact that you cannot combine opposite elements when spellcasting, and to defeat the wizard you must  negate his spells by casting with the opposite elements.

CREDITS: All programming + level design was done by me, many assets were found online (all with the appropriate licenses). Any assets not listed in the link were also made by me during the jam.
